column4: Hey guys, what packages should I install if I need to buidl GTK dev apps?
What package do I need to download to enable the "autoheader" command?
Thanks Seveas
sudo apt-get build-dep "the name of the package that you're trying to build"
I'm trying to build GNOME Clipboard Manager Applet from source
Now I'm getting an error in make: configure.in:80: m4_popdef: undefined macro: AC_Dest.
what is the home page of the applet project?
http://gcm.sourceforge.net/
it looks really broken
You mean, the app does?
well, the autoconf script use deprecated templates
although, it's building now
I still can't install libgtk2.0-dev
do mind waiting a little, so I can build a debian package for it
Why, I wouldn't mind at all. That'd be awfully nice of you.
hmm, doesn't build
The app itself is probably just broken.  It's all good, though - Zealot linked me to a binary for an app called "glipper"
probably a better choice
Aye.
they even use Ubuntu :-) http://sourceforge.net/project/screenshots.php?group_id=167085
